verses.roman:
vātula bālakera mātā nāhi laya doṣa
ei jāni' mātā more nā karaya roṣa

synonyms: vātula bālakera—of a mad son; mātā—mother; nāhi—does not; laya—accept; doṣa—fault; ei jāni'-knowing this; mātā—mother; more—unto Me; nā karaya roṣa—is not at all angry.
translation: "A mother is not offended by her mad son, and, knowing this, My mother is not offended by Me.
